00069                                              m_lastMatchType(MATCH_NONE), curAssist_(0),

00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 // Function: addEndpoint()
00096 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void MCAPIContentMatcher::addEndpoint(QString const& name, MCAPIEndpointDirection type,
00098                                       QString const& nodeName, QString const& portName)
00099 {
00100     EndpointDesc endpointDesc(name, type, portName);
00101 
00102     // Check if the node is the local node.
00103     if (m_localNode.name == nodeName)
00104     {
00105         m_localNode.endpoints.push_back(endpointDesc);
00106         return;
00107     }
00108 
00109     // Otherwise find out the correct remote node.
00110     QList<NodeDesc>::iterator node = m_remoteNodes.begin();
00111 
00112     while (node != m_remoteNodes.end())
00113     {
00114         if (node->name == nodeName)
00115         {
00116             // If the receiver was found, just add the endpoint descriptor to its list of endpoints.
00117             node->endpoints.push_back(endpointDesc);
00118             return;
00119         }
00120 
00121         ++node;
00122     }
00123 
00124     // If the receiver node was not found, add it to the list.
00125     m_remoteNodes.push_back(NodeDesc(nodeName));
00126     m_remoteNodes.back().endpoints.push_back(endpointDesc);
00127 }

00139 // Function: lookForwardMatch()
00140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 bool MCAPIContentMatcher::lookForwardMatch(QString const& text)
00142 {
00143     int index = 0;
00144     int toolTipIndex = 0;
00145     return (m_lastMatchType != MATCH_NONE &&
00146             enumerateMatches(text, 0, index, 0, toolTipIndex) == m_lastMatchType);
00147 }

00149 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 // Function: fillWithContent()
00151 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152  bool MCAPIContentMatcher::fillWithContent(QString const& text, TextContentAssistWidget& assist,
00153                                            int& startIndex, QString& toolTipText, int& toolTipIndex)
00154 {
00155     curAssist_ = &assist;
00156 
00157     toolTipText.clear();    
00158     m_lastMatchType = enumerateMatches(text, &MCAPIContentMatcher::addMatchToAssist,
00159                                        startIndex, &toolTipText, toolTipIndex);
00160 
00161     curAssist_->sortItems();
00162 
00163     return (m_lastMatchType != MATCH_NONE);
00164 }

00166 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 // Function: enumerateMatches()
00168 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 MCAPIContentMatcher::MatchType MCAPIContentMatcher::enumerateMatches(QString const& text, MatchExecFunc func,
00170                                                                      int& startIndex, QString* toolTipText,
00171                                                                      int& toolTipIndex)
00172 {
00173     static QRegExp funcCallExp("[a-z|A-Z|_][a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]*\\([a-z|A-Z|0-9|_|,|&|\\s]*$");
00174 
00175     bool exactMatch = false;
00176     int count = 0;
00177     
00178     // Enumerate function parameters if a function call is found.
00179     if (funcCallExp.indexIn(text) >= 0)
00180     {
00181         count = enumerateFunctionParams(text, func, startIndex, exactMatch, toolTipText, toolTipIndex);
00182 
00183         if (count > 0 && !(count == 1 && exactMatch))
00184         {
00185             return MATCH_FUNCTION;
00186         }
00187     }
00188     // If not found, enumerate plain names.
00189     else
00190     {
00191         count = enumerateNames(text, func, startIndex, exactMatch);
00192 
00193         if (count > 0 && !(count == 1 && exactMatch))
00194         {
00195             return MATCH_PARAM;
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     return MATCH_NONE;
00200 }
00201 
00202 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203 // Function: enumerateNames()
00204 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 int MCAPIContentMatcher::enumerateNames(QString const &text, MatchExecFunc func, int &startIndex,
00206                                         bool& exactMatch)
00207 {
00208     exactMatch = false;
00209     int count = 0;
00210 
00211     // Check if the last word could be a name.
00212     static QRegExp lastWordExp("[a-z|A-Z|_][a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]*$");
00213     startIndex = lastWordExp.indexIn(text, 0);
00214 
00215     if (startIndex >= 0)
00216     {
00217         QString word = text.mid(startIndex, lastWordExp.matchedLength());
00218 
00219         // Search for functions that start with the retrieved word.
00220         QRegExp matchExp("^" + word.toLower() + ".*");
00221 
00222         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < s_functionSet.getCount(); ++i)
00223         {
00224             if (tryMatchIdentifier(s_functionSet.getAt(i).getName(), MCAPI_CONTENT_FUNC, matchExp, func, count))
00225             {
00226                 // Check if this was an exact match.
00227                 if (!exactMatch && s_functionSet.getAt(i).getName() == word)
00228                 {
00229                     exactMatch = true;
00230                 }
00231             }
00232         }
00233 
00234         // Search for types that start with the retrieved word.
00235         for (int i = 0; i < TYPENAME_COUNT; ++i)
00236         {
00237             if (tryMatchIdentifier(TYPENAMES[i], MCAPI_CONTENT_TYPENAME, matchExp, func, count))
00238             {
00239                 // Check if this was an exact match.
00240                 if (!exactMatch && TYPENAMES[i] == word)
00241                 {
00242                     exactMatch = true;
00243                 }
00244             }
00245         }
00246     }
00247 
00248     return count;
00249 }
00250 
00251 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 // Function: enumerateFunctionParams()
00253 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00254 int MCAPIContentMatcher::enumerateFunctionParams(QString const &text, MatchExecFunc func,
00255                                                  int &startIndex, bool& exactMatch,
00256                                                  QString* toolTipText, int& toolTipIndex)
00257 {
00258     // Used static regular expressions.
00259     static QRegExp funcCallExp("[a-z|A-Z|_][a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]*\\([a-z|A-Z|0-9|_|,|&|\\s]*$");
00260     static QRegExp lastParamExp("[(|,]\\s*(&)?([a-z|A-Z|0-9|_][a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]*)?$");
00261     static QRegExp callStartExp("\\([a-z|A-Z|0-9|_|,|&|\\s]*$");
00262     
00263     exactMatch = false;
00264     int count = 0;
00265 
00266     // Find the beginning of the function call.
00267     int funcStartIndex = funcCallExp.indexIn(text, 0);
00268     Q_ASSERT(funcStartIndex >= 0);
00269     
00270     // Search for the last param.
00271     int index = lastParamExp.indexIn(text, funcStartIndex);
00272 
00273     if (index >= 0)
00274     {
00275         // If found, discard the leading whitespaces, left parentheses and commas.
00276         startIndex = text.indexOf(QRegExp("[&|a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]"), index);
00277 
00278         if (startIndex < 0)
00279         {
00280             startIndex = index + lastParamExp.matchedLength();
00281         }
00282 
00283         QString word = text.mid(startIndex, lastParamExp.matchedLength() - (startIndex - index));
00284         
00285         // Extract the function name & parameter list from the text.
00286         index = callStartExp.indexIn(text, funcStartIndex);
00287         Q_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00288 
00289         QString funcName = text.mid(funcStartIndex, index - funcStartIndex);
00290         QString paramListText = text.mid(index + 1);
00291 
00292         // Extract previous parameters to a list for easy access.
00293         QStringList params;
00294         extractParams(paramListText, params);
00295 
00296         // Based on the function description, try to match content.
00297         MCAPIFunctionDesc const* funcDesc = s_functionSet.find(funcName);
00298 
00299         if (funcDesc != 0 &&
00300             static_cast<unsigned int>(params.count()) < funcDesc->getParamCount())
00301         {
00302             // Generate a tooltip text.
00303             if (toolTipText != 0)
00304             {
00305                 funcDesc->generateToolTipText(params.count(), *toolTipText);
00306                 toolTipIndex = index + 1;
00307             }
00308 
00309             // Try to match the parameter to the corresponding function.
00310             tryMatchParam(funcDesc, params, word, func, count);
00311         }
00312     }
00313 
00314     return count;
00315 }

00326 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00327 // Function: findNodeDesc()
00328 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 MCAPIContentMatcher::NodeDesc const* MCAPIContentMatcher::findNodeDesc(QString const& name) const
00330 {
00331     // Check if the name matches with the name of the local node.
00332     if (m_localNode.name == name)
00333     {
00334         return &m_localNode;
00335     }
00336 
00337     // Otherwise try to find a match from the remote nodes.
00338     QList<NodeDesc>::const_iterator itrNode = m_remoteNodes.begin();
00339 
00340     while (itrNode != m_remoteNodes.end())
00341     {
00342         if (itrNode->name == name)
00343         {
00344             return &(*itrNode);
00345         }
00346 
00347         ++itrNode;
00348     }
00349 
00350     return 0;
00351 }

00353 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00354 // Function: findNodeDesc()
00355 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00356 MCAPIContentMatcher::EndpointDesc const* MCAPIContentMatcher::findEndpointDesc(QString const& name) const
00357 {
00358     // Check for the endpoint from the local node first.
00359     EndpointDescList::const_iterator itrEndpoint = m_localNode.endpoints.begin();
00360 
00361     while (itrEndpoint != m_localNode.endpoints.end())
00362     {
00363         if (itrEndpoint->name == name)
00364         {
00365             return &(*itrEndpoint);
00366         }
00367 
00368         ++itrEndpoint;
00369     }
00370 
00371     // Otherwise try to find it from the remote nodes.
00372     QList<NodeDesc>::const_iterator itrNode = m_remoteNodes.begin();
00373 
00374     while (itrNode != m_remoteNodes.end())
00375     {
00376         itrEndpoint = itrNode->endpoints.begin();
00377 
00378         while (itrEndpoint != itrNode->endpoints.end())
00379         {
00380             if (itrEndpoint->name == name)
00381             {
00382                 return &(*itrEndpoint);
00383             }
00384 
00385             ++itrEndpoint;
00386         }
00387         
00388         ++itrNode;
00389     }
00390 
00391     return 0;
00392 }

00394 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00395 // Function: findConnectionDesc()
00396 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00397 MCAPIContentMatcher::ConnectionDesc const* MCAPIContentMatcher::findConnectionDesc(QString const& name) const
00398 {
00399     ConnectionDescList::const_iterator itrConn = m_connections.begin();
00400 
00401     while (itrConn != m_connections.end())
00402     {
00403         if (itrConn->localEndpoint == name || itrConn->remoteEndpoint == name)
00404         {
00405             return &(*itrConn);
00406         }
00407 
00408         ++itrConn;
00409     }
00410 
00411     return 0;
00412 }

00414 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00415 // Function: tryMatchParam()
00416 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00417 void MCAPIContentMatcher::tryMatchParam(MCAPIFunctionDesc const* funcDesc, QStringList const& params,
00418                                         QString const& word, MatchExecFunc func, int& count)
00419 {
00420     // Find out the parameter index.
00421     int paramIndex = params.count();
00422 
00423     QRegExp matchExp("^" + word.toLower() + ".*");
00424 
00425     // Based on the function parameter description, try to find matching content.
00426     unsigned int paramDesc = funcDesc->getParamType(paramIndex);
00427 
00428     // Check if the parameter is a local node id.
00429     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_LOCAL_NODE_ID)
00430     {
00431         tryMatchNodeParam(m_localNode, matchExp, func, count);
00432     }
00433 
00434     // Check if the parameter is a remote node id.
00435     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_REMOTE_NODE_ID)
00436     {
00437         for (int i = 0; i < m_remoteNodes.size(); ++i)
00438         {
00439             tryMatchNodeParam(m_remoteNodes.at(i), matchExp, func, count);
00440         }
00441     }
00442 
00443     // Check if the parameter is a port id.
00444     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_PORT_ID)
00445     {
00446         // The node is assumed to be the local node if not otherwise specified in the
00447         // first parameter of the function.
00448         QString nodeName = m_localNode.name;
00449 
00450         if (funcDesc->getParamCount() > 0 && (funcDesc->getParamType(0) & VAR_TYPE_NODE_ID) &&
00451             params.count() > 0)
00452         {
00453             nodeName = params.at(0);
00454         }
00455 
00456         NodeDesc const* nodeDesc = findNodeDesc(nodeName);
00457 
00458         if (nodeDesc != 0)
00459         {
00460             for (int i = 0; i < nodeDesc->endpoints.size(); ++i)
00461             {
00462                 tryMatchPortParam(nodeDesc->endpoints.at(i), matchExp, func, count);
00463             }
00464         }
00465     }
00466 
00467     QString otherEndpointName;
00468 
00469     // Check if the parameter is a local endpoint.
00470     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_LOCAL_ENDPOINT)
00471     {
00472         // Check if the remote endpoint has already been specified and the connection is valid.
00473         if (paramIndex > 0 && (funcDesc->getParamType(0) & VAR_TYPE_REMOTE_ENDPOINT))
00474         {
00475             if (isConnectionValid(params.at(0), paramDesc, funcDesc->getParamType(0), otherEndpointName))
00476             {
00477                 // Try to match with the other endpoint.
00478                 tryMatchIdentifier(otherEndpointName, MCAPI_CONTENT_ENDPOINT, matchExp, func, count);
00479             }
00480         }
00481         else
00482         {
00483             // Otherwise browse through the local endpoints, trying to find endpoints that match
00484             // with the parameter description.
00485             tryMatchEndpoints(m_localNode, paramDesc, matchExp, func, count);
00486         }
00487     }
00488 
00489     // Check if the parameter is a remote endpoint.
00490     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_REMOTE_ENDPOINT)
00491     {
00492         // Check if the local endpoint has already been specified and the connection is valid.
00493         if (paramIndex > 0 && (funcDesc->getParamType(0) & VAR_TYPE_LOCAL_ENDPOINT))
00494         {
00495             if (isConnectionValid(params.at(0), funcDesc->getParamType(0), paramDesc, otherEndpointName))
00496             {
00497                 // Try to match with the other endpoint.
00498                 tryMatchIdentifier(otherEndpointName, MCAPI_CONTENT_ENDPOINT, matchExp, func, count);
00499             }
00500         }
00501         else
00502         {
00503             // Otherwise browse through the remote endpoints, trying to find endpoints that match
00504             // with the parameter description.
00505             for (int i = 0; i < m_remoteNodes.size(); ++i)
00506             {
00507                 tryMatchEndpoints(m_remoteNodes.at(i), paramDesc, matchExp, func, count);
00508             }
00509         }
00510     }
00511 
00512     // Check if the parameter is a status pointer.
00513     if (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_STATUS_PTR)
00514     {
00515         tryMatchIdentifier(STATUS_VARIABLE_NAME, MCAPI_CONTENT_TYPENAME, matchExp, func, count);
00516     }
00517 }

00520 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00521 // Function: tryMatchNodeParam()
00522 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00523 void MCAPIContentMatcher::tryMatchNodeParam(NodeDesc const& desc, QRegExp& exp, MatchExecFunc func,
00524                                             int& count)
00525 {
00526     tryMatchIdentifier(desc.name, MCAPI_CONTENT_NODE_ID, exp, func, count);
00527 }

00529 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00530 // Function: tryMatchPortParam()
00531 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00532 void MCAPIContentMatcher::tryMatchPortParam(EndpointDesc const& desc, QRegExp& exp, MatchExecFunc func,
00533                                             int& count)
00534 {
00535     tryMatchIdentifier(desc.portName, MCAPI_CONTENT_PORT_ID, exp, func, count);
00536 }

00538 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00539 // Function: tryMatchEndpoints()
00540 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00541 void MCAPIContentMatcher::tryMatchEndpoints(NodeDesc const& node, unsigned int paramDesc, QRegExp matchExp,
00542                                             MatchExecFunc func, int& count)
00543 {
00544     EndpointDescList::const_iterator itrEndpoint = node.endpoints.begin();
00545 
00546     while (itrEndpoint != node.endpoints.end())
00547     {
00548         // Search for a matching connection.
00549         ConnectionDesc const* connDesc = findConnectionDesc(itrEndpoint->name);
00550 
00551         if (connDesc != 0 && isEndpointValid(paramDesc, itrEndpoint->type, connDesc->type))
00552         {
00553             tryMatchIdentifier(itrEndpoint->name, MCAPI_CONTENT_ENDPOINT, matchExp, func, count);
00554         }
00555 
00556         ++itrEndpoint;
00557     }
00558 }
00559 
00560 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 // Function: tryMatchIdentifier()
00562 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00563 bool MCAPIContentMatcher::tryMatchIdentifier(QString const& identifier, MCAPIContentType type,
00564                                              QRegExp& exp, MatchExecFunc func, int& count)
00565 {
00566     if (identifier.toLower().contains(exp))
00567     {
00568         if (func != 0)
00569         {
00570             func(*curAssist_, identifier, m_icons[type]);
00571         }
00572 
00573         ++count;
00574 
00575         return true;
00576     }
00577 
00578     return false;
00579 }
00580 
00581 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00582 // Function: isEndpointValid()
00583 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00584 bool MCAPIContentMatcher::isEndpointValid(unsigned int paramDesc, MCAPIEndpointDirection endpointType,
00585                                           MCAPIDataType connType)
00586 {
00587     // The input/output type must match.
00588     bool validInOut = (endpointType == MCAPI_ENDPOINT_IN && (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_CONN_IN)) ||
00589         (endpointType == MCAPI_ENDPOINT_OUT && (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_CONN_OUT));
00590 
00591     // The connection type must match.
00592     bool validConn = (connType == MCAPI_TYPE_SCALAR && (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_CONN_SCALAR)) ||
00593         (connType == MCAPI_TYPE_PACKET && (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_CONN_PACKET)) ||
00594         (connType == MCAPI_TYPE_MESSAGE && (paramDesc & VAR_TYPE_CONN_MSG));
00595 
00596     return (validInOut && validConn);
00597 }
00598 
00599 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00600 // Function: isConnectionValid()
00601 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00602 bool MCAPIContentMatcher::isConnectionValid(QString const& endpointName, unsigned int localDesc,
00603                                             unsigned int remoteDesc, QString& otherEndpointName) const
00604 {
00605     // Search for a matching connection.
00606     ConnectionDesc const* connDesc = findConnectionDesc(endpointName);
00607 
00608     if (connDesc == 0)
00609     {
00610         return false;
00611     }
00612     
00613     // Find the endpoint descriptions corresponding to both ends of the connection.
00614     EndpointDesc const* endpoint1Desc = findEndpointDesc(connDesc->localEndpoint);
00615     EndpointDesc const* endpoint2Desc = findEndpointDesc(connDesc->remoteEndpoint);
00616     Q_ASSERT(endpoint1Desc != 0);
00617     Q_ASSERT(endpoint2Desc != 0);
00618 
00619     // Both endpoints must match with the parameter descriptions.
00620     if (!isEndpointValid(localDesc, endpoint1Desc->type, connDesc->type) ||
00621         !isEndpointValid(remoteDesc, endpoint2Desc->type, connDesc->type))
00622     {
00623         return false;
00624     }
00625 
00626     if (connDesc->localEndpoint == endpointName)
00627     {
00628         otherEndpointName = connDesc->remoteEndpoint;
00629     }
00630     else
00631     {
00632         otherEndpointName = connDesc->localEndpoint;
00633     }
00634 
00635     return true;
00636 }
00637 
00638 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00639 // Function: extractParams()
00640 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00641 void MCAPIContentMatcher::extractParams(QString const& paramsListStr, QStringList& params)
00642 {
00643     static QRegExp paramExtractExp("([a-z|A-Z|0-9|_][^,]*)?(?=\\s*[,|$])");
00644 
00645     // Clear the parameter list.
00646     params.clear();
00647 
00648     // Extract parameters one-by-one.
00649     int index = paramExtractExp.indexIn(paramsListStr);
00650 
00651     while (index >= 0)
00652     {
00653         params.push_back(paramsListStr.mid(index, paramExtractExp.matchedLength()));
00654 
00655         // Find the next comma to prepare for extracting the next parameter.
00656         int nextComma = paramsListStr.indexOf(',', index + paramExtractExp.matchedLength());
00657 
00658         // If not found, there are no more complete parameters (only the one that is
00659         // being written at the moment).
00660         if (nextComma < 0)
00661         {
00662             break;
00663         }
00664 
00665         index = paramExtractExp.indexIn(paramsListStr, nextComma + 1);
00666     }
00667 }
